languages.text: Древнее эльдарское устройство, окутывающее носителя покровом дуновений варп-ветра. Предположительно, оно работает по тому же принципу, что и броня зловещих воинов Варп-пауков, но лишено вместительных энергетических батарей. Вместо этого оно улавливает и поглощает энергию психического страдания из окружающего мира.

An ancient Aeldari device that shrouds its wearer in a veil of small warp wind gusts. It has been theorised that it uses the same principle as the armour of the sinister Warp Spider warriors, minus the high-capacity power batteries. Instead, it senses and absorbs the energy of psychic suffering from its surroundings.
languages.original_text: Древнее эльдарское устройство, окутывающее носителя покровом дуновений варп-ветра. Предположительно, оно работает по тому же принципу, что и броня зловещих воинов Варп-пауков, но лишено вместительных энергетических батарей. Вместо этого оно улавливает и поглощает энергию психического страдания из окружающего мира.

traits.locale_text: An ancient Aeldari device that shrouds its wearer in a veil of small wafts of warp wind. It has been theorised that it uses the same principle as the armour of the sinister Warp Spider warriors, minus the high-capacity power batteries. Instead, it senses and absorbs the energy of psychic suffering from its surroundings.

Instead, it senses and absorbs the energy of psychic suffering from its surroundings.

Instead, it senses and absorbs the energy of psychic suffering from its surroundings.

An ancient Aeldari device that shrouds its wearer in a veil of small warp wind gusts. It has been theorised that it uses the same principle as the armour of the sinister Warp Spider warriors, minus the high-capacity power batteries. Instead, it senses and absorbs the energy of psychic suffering from its surroundings.

languages.text: Un antiguo dispositivo Aeldari que cubre a su portador de un velo de pequeñas ráfagas de viento. Según nuestras teorías, usa los mismos principios que la armadura de los siniestros guerreros conocidos como Arañas de Disformidad, quitando las baterías de gran potencia. En vez de eso, detecta y absorbe la energía psíquica del sufrimiento en su entorno.
languages.original_text: An ancient Aeldari device that shrouds its wearer in a veil of small warp wind gusts. It has been theorised that it uses the same principle as the armour of the sinister Warp Spider warriors, minus the high-capacity power batteries. Instead, it senses and absorbs the energy of psychic suffering from its surroundings.

traits.locale_text: Un antiguo dispositivo Aeldari que cubre a su portador de un velo de pequeñas ráfagas de viento. Según nuestras teorías, usa los mismos principios que la armadura de los siniestros guerreros conocidos como Arañas de Disformidad, quitando las baterías de gran potencia. En vez de eso, detecta y absorbe la energía psíquica del sufrimiento en su entorno.

languages.text: Un antique appareil aeldari qui dissimule son porteur sous un voile de bourrasques du Warp. On pense qu'il fonctionne sur le même principe que l'armure des sinistres Araignées Spectrales, mais sans leurs batteries à haute capacité. Il a pour fonction de détecter et d'absorber l'énergie émise par la souffrance psychique dans son rayon d'action.
languages.original_text: An ancient Aeldari device that shrouds its wearer in a veil of small warp wind gusts. It has been theorised that it uses the same principle as the armour of the sinister Warp Spider warriors, minus the high-capacity power batteries. Instead, it senses and absorbs the energy of psychic suffering from its surroundings.

traits.locale_text: Un antique appareil aeldari qui dissimule son porteur sous un voile de bourrasques du Warp. On pense qu'il fonctionne sur le même principe que l'armure des sinistres Araignées Spectrales, mais sans leurs batteries à haute capacité. Il a pour fonction de détecter et d'absorber l'énergie émise par la souffrance psychique dans son rayon d'action.

languages.text: 古老的艾达灵族装置，可以将佩戴者笼罩在亚空间阵风中。人们推测，这种装置与邪恶的次元蜘蛛战士的护甲原理相似，区别在于后者使用大容量电池，而这种装置会感知并吸收环境中的痛苦灵能。
languages.original_text: An ancient Aeldari device that shrouds its wearer in a veil of small warp wind gusts. It has been theorised that it uses the same principle as the armour of the sinister Warp Spider warriors, minus the high-capacity power batteries. Instead, it senses and absorbs the energy of psychic suffering from its surroundings.

traits.locale_text: 古老的艾达灵族装置，可以将佩戴者笼罩在亚空间阵风中。人们推测，这种装置与邪恶的次元蜘蛛战士的护甲原理相似，区别在于后者使用大容量电池，而这种装置会感知并吸收环境中的痛苦灵能。

languages.text: 着用者を小さな<歪み>の風の帳で覆い隠す古代アエルダリの装置。不吉なワープ・スパイダーの戦士の鎧と同じ原理を使用していると考えられているが、大容量のパワーバッテリーは使用されていない。その代わり、周囲から精神的苦痛のエネルギーを感知し、吸収している。
languages.original_text: An ancient Aeldari device that shrouds its wearer in a veil of small warp wind gusts. It has been theorised that it uses the same principle as the armour of the sinister Warp Spider warriors, minus the high-capacity power batteries. Instead, it senses and absorbs the energy of psychic suffering from its surroundings.

traits.locale_text: 着用者を小さな<歪み>の風の帳で覆い隠す古代アエルダリの装置。不吉なワープ・スパイダーの戦士の鎧と同じ原理を使用していると考えられているが、大容量のパワーバッテリーは使用されていない。その代わり、周囲から精神的苦痛のエネルギーを感知し、吸収している。

languages.text: Ein uraltes Aeldari-Gerät, das den Träger durch einen Schleier aus kleinen Warp-Windböden verbirgt. Es gibt die Theorie, dass es dasselbe Prinzip nutzt wie die Panzerung der düsteren Warpspinnen-Krieger, nur ohne die Hochleistungsakkus. Stattdessen spürt und absorbiert es die Energie psychischen Leids in der Umgebung.
languages.original_text: An ancient Aeldari device that shrouds its wearer in a veil of small warp wind gusts. It has been theorised that it uses the same principle as the armour of the sinister Warp Spider warriors, minus the high-capacity power batteries. Instead, it senses and absorbs the energy of psychic suffering from its surroundings.

Es gibt die Theorie, dass es dasselbe Prinzip nutzt wie die Panzerung der düsteren Warpspinnen-Krieger, nur ohne die Hochleistungsakkus. Stattdessen spürt und absorbiert es die Energie psychischen Leids in der Umgebung.

languages.text: Takan kişiyi küçük öteboyut rüzgârlarından ibaret bir örtüyle saran kadim bir Aeldari cihazı. Uğursuz Öte Örümceği savaşçılarının zırhlarıyla aynı prensibi kullandığı ancak yüksek kapasiteli güç bataryalarına sahip olmadığı teorisi ortaya atılmıştır. Bunun yerine çevresindeki ruhsezisel acıların enerjisini algılayarak emdiği düşünülmektedir.
languages.original_text: An ancient Aeldari device that shrouds its wearer in a veil of small warp wind gusts. It has been theorised that it uses the same principle as the armour of the sinister Warp Spider warriors, minus the high-capacity power batteries. Instead, it senses and absorbs the energy of psychic suffering from its surroundings.
